message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you my product for $1,200,000. I believe this price reflects its value while also allowing for a mutually beneficial transaction. Let me know your thoughts!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am proposing to purchase the product for $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the item.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $950,000 is a bit low for me.  Let's meet in the middle - I'm willing to offer you the product for $1,050,000. This still allows you a substantial profit margin and is closer to my valuation.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your flexibility. However, based on my budget, I would like to propose purchasing the product for $1,000,000. I hope this suggestion will be acceptable.
